select e.EQUIP_SEQ ,e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ ,e.MANUFACTURER ,e.DESCRIPTION ,e.MANAGER ,e.EQUIP_NAME ,e.AVAILABLE ,sc.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME
from EQUIP e, SUB_CATEGORY sc where e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = sc.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ
and e.VISIBLE = 'T' order by e.SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ, e.EQUIP_SEQ
select EQUIP_SEQ ,SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ ,MANUFACTURER ,DESCRIPTION ,MANAGER ,EQUIP_NAME ,AVAILABLE from EQUIP where SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ = #{SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ} and VISIBLE = 'T' order by EQUIP_SEQ
select CATEGORY_SEQ ,CATEGORY_NAME from CATEGORY where VISIBLE = 'T'
select EQUIP_SEQ , SUB_CATEGORY_SEQ , MANUFACTURER , DESCRIPTION , MANAGER , EQUIP_NAME , AVAILABLE from EQUIP where EQUIP_SEQ = #{EQUIP_SEQ}
